    • Constructor Detail

      • ProxyGame

        public ProxyGame()
        Contructor for the Proxy Game class. It initializes a list of valid users to be able to play the game and their corresponding passwords. Create a graphical interface with a welcoming message to introduce a valid user.

    • Method Detail

      • receivedMessage

        public void receivedMessage(int type)
        This method is called when an event is produced in the graphical interface. If the player has already entered correctly both a user and password, the proxy just forwards the information to the actual game. If not, the method will first ask the player to enter a valid user. It will keep asking until one is supplied. After a valid user has been introduced, it will ask for it's password. It wikk keep asking until the correct one is supplied.
        Specified by:
        receivedMessage in interface InterfaceGame
        Parameters:
        type - The state of the game.
